Great food and service I highly recommend any of their rolls i usually go with the pepperoni or meatball. The white cheese pizza is always a hit and of the best steak cheese and peppers hero around.

. Ordered a Calzone with chicken & bacon. Calzone was fresh but half the calzone had not a single thing it. This is now the 2nd time I've had an issue like this. Last time was a lasagna that had almost no meat in it & barely any pasta. Last time I order from here.

We order pizza from these guys a couple times a month. The pizza is always fresh and delicious! Compared to the other pizza vendors in the area,  for the price and quality, Scala is our go-to pizza place. During COVID, they were especially rigorous with hygiene, which was very much appreciated.  Thanks, guys!
